directions: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil.  Add potatoes and cook until tender, about 25 minutes. Drain and mash.
In a large bowl beat the cream cheese and dressing mix until smooth.  Stir in mashed potatoes, sour cream and butter; beat until desired consistency is reached.
ingredients: 1 (1 ounce) package dry Ranch-style dressing mix
title: Cream Cheese Ranch Potatoes
